task.title: View or Change Personal Information
task.shortdesc: Follow this procedure to view or change your personal information using the MyPack Portal.

context.p: Your personal information includes details such as your Student ID, contact information, addresses, and emergency contacts. It is important to keep this information up-to-date for academic and financial purposes.

step.cmd: Log in to MyPack Portal and go to the Student Homepage.
From the list, choose the section you wish to update, such as Contact Details or Addresses.
Make the necessary changes, then click Save.
